title: riot pls help me
body:
someone stole my account and changed my pasword then i cant login pls contackt me at my gmail peraperic.pj@gmail.com

P.S my nick and username is pekithelegend

replies.body: Make sure you shoot a ticket over to your EUNE agents to have them help you out with securing your account! They'll be able to make sure nobody else has access and should be able to repair any damage that was done without your consent.
